title: ICT Readiness and BYOD Implementation Competency Enhancement Program for Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics knowledge and fundamental smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: Aiming to enhance ICT readiness in math education within smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Providing simulation/VR learning environments to develop personal device utilization skills through BYOD practices

learning_goals: Learners can explain practical strategies for each of the six ICT readiness indicators in math education: understanding, curriculum, pedagogy, technical infrastructure, organizational management, and teacher learning.
Learners can present math lesson design and implementation plans using Android-based educational apps (GuideLinks, LDSoft) in BYOD environments.
Learners can create and share math educational materials and implement collaborative learning scenarios in limited-technology environments (primarily smartphone-based).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
